name: PCRPG
description:
PCRPG Website

The free demo for PCRPG. Contains only 1 of the planned 5 parts, or about 6 hours of gameplay. The Kickstarter campaign is planned to launch on December 7, 2021.  Saves from the demo will be able to be imported into the final game, which will be a paid release.

PCRPG is an action economy turn-based RPG with an emphasis on team building, equipment and customization.  Experience the charming "gameboy style" "2-bit" pixel art, a chiptune soundtrack made with klystrack, and digital face sprite artwork for characters. Also it's kind of funny.
